summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1991 CHEVROLET LUMINA.  DURING AN INSPECTION, IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THE SUBFRAME BUSHING WAS MISSING FROM THE VEHICLE.  THE MECHANIC REFERENCED RECALL # 00V189000 (STRUCTURE) AND STATED THAT THE VEHICLE NEEDS TO BE SERVICED.  THE MECHANIC ADVISED THE CONTACT NOT TO DRIVE AT HIGHWAY SPEEDS.  THE MANUFACTURER STATED THAT THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 168,000.
